Question: This person later followed with "Cherry, Cherry", "Kentucky Woman", "Thank the Lord for the Night Time", "Do It", and others.
Hints: This person continues to record and release new material and maintains an extensive touring schedule as well.
This person then married Marcia Murphey, a production assistant; they also had two children, both sons, Jesse and Micah.
Keeping his songwriting skills honed, this person also recorded two albums of mostly new material during this period.
